title: The union of architecture, sculpture, and painting; exemplified by a series of illustrations, with descriptive accounts of the house and galleries of John Soane ... / by John Britton
dimensions: xvi, 60 pages : color frontispiece, illustrations, 21 plates, includes plans; Height: 11 7/16 in. (29 cm)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. Bequest of Mrs. Charles Wrightsman, 2019
